characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with slightly warm undertones, even complexion, minimal visible pores
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright cornflower blue eyes with a subtle greyish tint, darker limbal ring
characterDescription.eyeShape: almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned outer corners, prominent upper eyelid crease
characterDescription.hairColor: medium auburn brown with subtle hints of warm red highlights in certain strands, darker roots are just barely visible
characterDescription.hairTexture: wavy with natural curl, medium-fine strands, appears slightly frizzy and flyaway
characterDescription.hairStyle: two high pigtails with white pompom hair clips, bangs fringe around the forehead, sides are loosely curled
characterDescription.faceShape: round face with soft, rounded features, full cheeks, and a gentle jawline
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip, nostrils are subtly flared
characterDescription.lips: naturally rosy pink lips, fuller bottom lip than top, Cupid's bow is subtly defined
characterDescription.smile: slight, serious expression, no visible teeth, natural lip shape
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick eyebrows, light brown color, slightly arched, slightly feathered appearance
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears, partially obscured by hair but appear to be close to the head
characterDescription.cheeks: full, round cheeks with a slight natural flush
characterDescription.chin: soft, rounded chin that blends smoothly into the jawline
characterDescription.facialProportions: eyes are large and take up a significant portion of the face, nose is small relative to face size, mouth is proportionally balanced
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Very slight freckles across the bridge of the nose and tops of the cheeks, small scar above the left eyebrow towards the middle of her forehead, slight dark circles under eyes.
characterDescription.overallImpression: sweet, somewhat serious demeanor, innocent and youthful appearance, features appear soft and delicate
characterDescription.fullDescription: This is a 5-6 year old girl with fair skin and slightly warm undertones. She has bright cornflower blue, almond-shaped eyes with darker limbal rings. Her hair is medium auburn brown, naturally wavy and styled in two high pigtails with white pompom clips. She has a round face with full cheeks, a small, slightly upturned nose and naturally rosy pink lips. She possesses a subtle freckles on the bridge of her nose and around her cheeks, and a small scar is visible above the middle of her left eyebrow.
